content: .textarea-field { position: relative; transition: all 0.2s; min-height: 40px; border-radius: 5px; } .textarea-field textarea { width: 100%; height: 100%; min-height: 80px; outline: none; resize: none; transition: all 0.2s; display: block; padding:  10px  !important; border: 1px solid rgb(173, 173, 173); border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; z-index: 5; background: transparent; } .textarea-field textarea::placeholder { opacity: 0; } .textarea-field textarea+label { position: absolute !important; top: 50%; transform: translateY(-50%); left: 10px !important; transition: all 0.2s; z-index: 1; font-style: italic; font-size: 14px; background: #193756; color: #51C9CD; white-space: nowrap; padding: 2px 3px; line-height: 1; border-radius: 4px; } .textarea-field textarea+label::after { position: absolute !important; top: 50% !important; left: 10px !important; font-size: 14px; transform: translateY(-50%) !important; box-shadow: 0 0 0px 3px #fff !important; } .textarea-field textarea:hover { border: 1px solid #007bff; } .textarea-field textarea:hover+label { color: #007bff; } .textarea-field textarea:focus{border: 1px solid #007bff !important; outline: 2px #a585f9 solid !important;}.textarea-field textarea:focus+label, .textarea-field textarea:valid+label { top: 0% !important; left: 10px !important; z-index: 10; } .textarea-field textarea:focus+label::after, .textarea-field textarea:valid+label::after { position: absolute !important; top: 50% !important; left: 10px !important; font-size: 12px !important; transform: translateY(-50%) !important; box-shadow: -3px 0 0 #fff, 3px 0 0 #fff !important; }
